dimension.from sentence: In our work , the dimension of word embedding vectors and hidden state vectors is 300 .

all bias.from sentence: All out - ofvocabulary words and weight matrices are randomly initialized by a uniform distribution U ( - 0.1 , 0.1 ) , and all bias are set to zero .

Tensor Flow.from sentence: Tensor Flow is used for implementing our neural network model .

paired t- test.from sentence: The paired t- test is used for the significance testing .

GloVe 2 vectors.from sentence: We use GloVe 2 vectors with 300 dimensions to initialize the word embeddings , the same as .

model training.from sentence: In model training , the learning rate is set to 0.1 , the weight for L 2 - norm regularization is set to 1 e - 5 , and dropout rate is set to 0.5 .

model.from sentence: We train the model use stochastic gradient descent optimizer with momentum of 0.9 .
